sentences.sentence: Well, tell me you old coot!
sentences.translation: 好吧，说吧你这个老傻瓜！

sentences.sentence: His friend seemed impressed that the coot knew so much about other places.
sentences.translation: 他的朋友们留下了深刻印象，该笨人知道这么多关于其他地方。

sentences.sentence: All summer, in this world of water lilies, the coot and moorhen lived a confused life.
sentences.translation: 整个夏季，在这睡莲的世界里，蹼鸡和黑水鸡过着困惑迷茫的日子。
